channel.title: Server hosting!
channel.description:
Ok I will host 2 servers per time. ( 24\7 ) Hopefully my pc wont crash but it shouldn't.
Current positions.
EMPTY - 24\7 EMPTY - 24\7
EMPTY - 5 - 7 \ 7
Of course, I'm not doing it for free.... Prices. rs2 gold. Post offer's here, I want at least 300k per fornight 24/7 150k per fornight 5 - 7 / 7
If there isn't an auto restarter in the source and it crashes over night, then it crashes. There may be 1 or 2 days per fornight where I can't keep it up 24\7 but that will be on RARE occasions. Maybe if the power goes out or my mum wont let me etc.... >.>
Here is the form.
[code]Servername: What time do you want me to host: How much will you pay: When do you want me to start: If source has auto-restarter: No-IP or Hamachi: [/code]
PM me with the download thingy or w/e
Cheers, x0 0wn

item.title: Server hosting!
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

Well I used the title to grab people’s attention, and no, I do not want to steal people’s servers or to scam, just try me… -.-
I’m not that kinda person…

Read full topic
